segments.text: Hi Colin . How are you feeling today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I feel ok but I ’ m still very tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . One minute I feel quite awake , and the next I feel very tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to visit any tourist spots in the city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , I'm very interested in Chinese history so I ’ d like to visit the Summer Palace .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . I ’ d be very happy to go there .
segments.speaker: S1
